verses.verse: For <S%H3117><s%>, behold, in those days, and in that time <S%H6256><s%>, when I shall bring back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>,

I will gather <S%H6908><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%>, and will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> into the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%>; and I will execute judgment <S%H8199><s%> upon them there for my people <S%H5971><s%> and for my heritage <S%H5159><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom they have scattered <S%H6340><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>: and they have parted <S%H2505><s%> my land <S%H776><s%>,

and have cast <S%H3032><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%>, and have given <S%H5414><s%> a boy <S%H3206><s%> for a harlot <S%H2181><s%>, and sold <S%H4376><s%> a girl <S%H3207><s%> for wine <S%H3196><s%>, that they may drink <S%H8354><s%>.

Yea <S%H6865><s%>, and what are ye to me, O Tyre, and Sidon <S%H6721><s%>, and all the regions <S%H1552><s%> of Philistia <S%H6429><s%>? will ye render <S%H7999><s%> me a recompense <S%H1576><s%>? and if ye recompense <S%H1580><s%> me <S%H7031><s%>, swiftly and speedily <S%H4120><s%> will I return <S%H7725><s%> your recompense <S%H1576><s%> upon your own head <S%H7218><s%>.

Forasmuch as ye have taken <S%H3947><s%> my silver <S%H3701><s%> and my gold <S%H2091><s%>, and have carried <S%H935><s%> into your temples <S%H1964><s%> my goodly <S%H2896><s%> precious things <S%H4261><s%>,

and have sold <S%H4376><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> unto the sons of the Grecians <S%H3125><s%>, that ye may remove them far <S%H7368><s%> from their border <S%H1366><s%>;

behold <S%H5782><s%>, I will stir them up out of the place <S%H4725><s%> whither ye have sold <S%H4376><s%> them <S%H7725><s%>, and will return your recompense <S%H1576><s%> upon your own head <S%H7218><s%>;

and I will sell <S%H4376><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and they shall sell <S%H4376><s%> them to the men of Sheba <S%H7615><s%>, to a nation <S%H1471><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.

Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> ye this among the nations <S%H1471><s%>; prepare <S%H6942><s%> war <S%H4421><s%>; stir up <S%H5782><s%> the mighty men <S%H1368><s%>; let all the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> draw near <S%H5066><s%>, let them come up <S%H5927><s%>.

Beat <S%H3807><s%> your plowshares <S%H855><s%> into swords <S%H2719><s%>, and your pruning-hooks <S%H4211><s%> into spears <S%H7420><s%>: let the weak <S%H2523><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, I am strong <S%H1368><s%>.

Haste <S%H5789><s%> ye <S%H935><s%>, and come, all ye nations <S%H1471><s%> round about <S%H6908><s%>, and gather yourselves together: thither <S%H5439><s%> cause thy mighty ones <S%H1368><s%> to come down <S%H5181><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Let the nations <S%H1471><s%> bestir <S%H5782><s%> themselves <S%H5927><s%>, and come up to the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%>; for there will I sit <S%H3427><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> all the nations <S%H1471><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Put <S%H7971><s%> ye in the sickle <S%H4038><s%>; for the harvest <S%H7105><s%> is ripe <S%H1310><s%>: come <S%H935><s%>, tread <S%H3381><s%> ye <S%H1660><s%>; for the winepress is full <S%H4390><s%>, the vats <S%H3342><s%> overflow <S%H7783><s%>; for their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>.

Multitudes <S%H1995><s%>, multitudes <S%H1995><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision <S%H2742><s%>! for the day <S%H3117><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision <S%H2742><s%>.
The sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> are darkened <S%H6937><s%>, and the stars <S%H3556><s%> withdraw <S%H622><s%> their shining <S%H5051><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will roar <S%H7580><s%> from Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and utter <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall shake <S%H7493><s%>: but Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will be a refuge <S%H4268><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>, and a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

So shall ye know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, dwelling <S%H7931><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>: then shall Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> be holy <S%H6944><s%>, and there shall no strangers <S%H2114><s%> pass through her any more <S%H5674><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall drop down <S%H5197><s%> sweet wine <S%H6071><s%>, and the hills <S%H1389><s%> shall flow <S%H3212><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%>, and all the brooks <S%H650><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall flow <S%H3212><s%> with waters <S%H4325><s%>; and a fountain <S%H4599><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and shall water <S%H8248><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Shittim <S%H7851><s%>.

Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be a desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and Edom <S%H123><s%> shall be a desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, for the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, because they have shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>.
But Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall abide <S%H3427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%>.
And I will cleanse <S%H5352><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%>, that I have not cleansed <S%H5352><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
